concept.title: February 23, 2017
concept.shortdesc: Release Notes for the February 23, 2017 release.

row.entry: Re-organized the Android SDK to ensure that example and reference implementation directories are more clearly identifiable by their location.
Android SDK modified to now support a minimum SDK version of 14 (down from 16).
Enhanced Conversation Apps to always link out to user profiles, even without a full auth integration.
Fixed a bug that now serves all Twitter images via HTTPS.
Added the ability to search by Instagram Places (check-in’s) in Library Instagram Search and Instagram Stream Rules.
Fixed a bug that prevented Twitter Social Accounts from saving.
Fixed a bug that prevented the “Conceal explicit images” option from functioning properly.

Enhanced Storify 2 to support permalinks opening a modal (previously the app would scroll to the post location on the page). In Storify 2’s Designer, we have added a configuration to toggle between Scroll and Modal permalink behavior. Modal permalink behavior will be default behavior.
Enhanced the Storify 2 Google AMP integration to produce a smaller CSS file.
Fixed a bug with Facebook rules that was causing content to be pulled in with incomplete metadata.
Enhanced content (images and videos) from Email Stream Rules to be available via HTTPS.
Added a label for the Mile Radius Value in maps in Twitter Stream Rules.
Fixed a bug with Facebook and Facebook Page Steam Rules to pull in posts with multiple media attachments appropriately.
Added a new feature to allow users to choose to apply or disable SAFE rules per stream rule.
Fixed a bug that was causing content to not publish or save correctly if it already existed.
Fixed a bug that caused multiple &’s from getting appended to the url when using filters in Studio.
Fixed a bug that prevented certain checkboxes in Studio filters from allowing to be unchecked.
Fixed a bug to show content in media modals with the correct aspect ratios.
Fixed a bug that was caused Media Walls to not render if specific foreign characters were included.
Fixed a bug that was causing pages to load incorrectly when paging through search results with “Conceal explicit images” enabled.
Increased session time before expiring Studio User login sessions . Once a Studio session expires the user will be redirected to log in again.
Fixed a bug that was sometimes preventing users from saving Instagram credentials.
Fixed a bug that was preventing the “Feature Tag” to save correctly when applied.
